name: 埃雷尼克·贝齐里

2019年 第72届戛纳电影节 主竞赛单元 短片金棕榈奖 (提名) 货车
name_full: 埃雷尼克·贝齐里 Erenik Beqiri
introduction: Erenik Beqiri graduated from the Tirana Academy of Arts with a Master’s Degree in Film Directing. In 2010 he directed his graduation film Seed Money, a short film written by Jim Uhls Fight Club. He participated in the Talent Campus in Sarajevo in 2009, as a screenwriter to develop the script of Reverse. Afterwards, he wrote and directed two short films, Alphonso in 2013 and Bon Appétit in 2016 nominated for the Silver Méliès.His latest short film, The Van is selected in Cannes in Official Competition in 2019. The film travels the world, with more than 60 selections to date, including Sarajevo, Odense, Clermont-Ferrand and is shortlisted for the 2021 Oscars.
